'''Ragash''' was a [[Moria]] [[Orcs|Orc scout]] who was a part of [[Azog|Azog's army]]. Ragash was invented by [[Warner Bros.]] for the [[The Hobbit (film series)|''Hobbit'' film series]], where he was physically portrayed by [[Allan Smith]] and voiced by Martin Kwok.

== History ==
As [[Azog]]'s army is making its way to the [[Lonely Mountain]] through the tunnels burrowed by the [[Were-worms]], Ragash alerts Azog that the army will be ready to attack the Mountain by dawn. It is unknown if Ragash survived the [[Battle of Five Armies]].<ref>''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]''</ref> He also had a brother named [[Margush]].
